item.title: Finding Light in Unpredictability
item.description: One of the most important facts to understand in life is that you don’t always get what you want. You can hope to achieve things in life. You can even work harder than others. However, there are factors beyond our control that will affect the overall outcome. Those factors play a significant role in our life. But why am I writing about this? I think, when life goes smoothly, we rarely question things.
